abstract: In El Salvador alone, 13,000 people have been displaced.
snippet: In El Salvador alone, 13,000 people have been displaced.
lead_paragraph: Floods and landslides resulting from heavy rains cause havoc across Central America. Dozens are dead, and losses of staple crops are expected to be severe. In El Salvador alone, an estimated 13,000 people have been displaced. [The Christian Science Monitor]

headline.main: On Our Radar: Floods in Central America
